name: Block the Blocks
description:
This game was made for the 204th Trijam.

The objective is to protect the blue border from the invading red blocks by blocking them. Each time you block one your score will increase, but if one goes through your score will go back to zero.

Press Space or Right Click to start moving or to flip your direction.

This is my first game jam - I don't think I finished the game within the three hour time limit for the Trijam, but thankfully it is not necessary.

All art, music and sound effects were made during the game jam.
